title: (x) Jerry Gaskill "Come Somewhere" album cover - Amoebia {BJ}
content: Hello. I'm new to the board but have been a lurker for some time (and plan on posting in the future for some feedback on my own font designs). But first, I need to identify the font used on this album cover. Thanks. ![album cover font](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014072726im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/34005.jpg)
author: psychopomp

comments.content:
It might be Amoebia by Jens Gelhaar   
   
 [http://www.apply.de/english/typefaces/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014072726/http:/www.apply.de/english/typefaces/index.html)

hmmm, maybe not ... well it has a Garagefonts feel. You might check there.   
   
 [http://www.garagefonts.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014072726/http:/www.garagefonts.com/)

That was a fast reply! :-)   
   
It looks like you were correct the first time. Much appreciated.
